      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock(int x,
                      int y)
        ask server for block on x and y coordinates. create request and wait for response
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of desired block
        y - coordinate of desired block
        Returns:
        desired block that came as a response from server

      • setBlock

        public boolean setBlock(int x,
                        int y,
                        Block block)
        ask server to set modify block on x and y coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        block - new version of block to be changed on some other client
        Returns:
        true if server sends back positive response. false otherwise

      • sendStateReady

        public void sendStateReady()
        local simulation finished evaluating a day. send STATE READY to server

      • sendStateSet

        public void sendStateSet()
        send current version of map blocks to server and be in STATE SET
